TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ProtectedConfigurationProvider extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase
Public MustInherit Class ProtectedConfigurationProvider Inherits ProviderBase

summary.span: 为加密和解密受保护的配置数据而创建提供程序的基类。

span.span: Is the base class to create providers for encrypting and decrypting protected-configuration data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以加密配置文件，以保护应用程序使用的敏感信息部分。You can encrypt sections of a configuration file to protect sensitive information used by your application. 这提高了安全性使得困难未经授权的访问，即使攻击者可以访问你的配置文件。This improves security by making it difficult for unauthorized access even if an attacker gains access to your configuration file. .NET Framework 包括两个受保护的配置提供程序可以用于加密配置文件部分。The .NET Framework includes two protected configuration providers that can be used to encrypt sections of a configuration file. 类使用来加密配置节。The class uses the to encrypt configuration sections. 类使用 Windows 数据保护 API (DPAPI) 来加密配置节。The class uses the Windows Data Protection API (DPAPI) to encrypt configuration sections. 你可能需要使用一种算法以外的 RSA 或 DPAPI 提供程序的敏感信息进行加密。You might have a requirement to encrypt sensitive information using an algorithm other than the RSA or DPAPI providers. 在这种情况下，你可以构建你自己的自定义受保护配置提供程序。In this case, you can build your own custom protected-configuration provider. 是必须继承自创建你自己的受保护配置提供程序的抽象基类。The is an abstract base class that you must inherit from to create your own protected-configuration provider. 是否使用标准或自定义提供程序，你必须确保它使用配置`add`中的元素`providers`部分`configProtectedData`配置节。Whether you use a standard or a custom provider, you must ensure that it is configured with the `add` element in the `providers` section of the `configProtectedData` configuration section. （请参阅下一个示例。）(See next example.) 有关详细信息，请参阅[实现保护配置提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/afc329e4-ef37-4915-b419-b37c745d2865)。For details, see [Implementing a Protected Configuration Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/afc329e4-ef37-4915-b419-b37c745d2865). > [!NOTE] > 当 ASP.NET 遇到加密的配置数据时，它将执行解密以透明方式使用配置的提供程序。When ASP.NET encounters encrypted configuration data, it performs decryption transparently using the configured provider. 在你端以外确保配置所需的提供程序不需要任何操作。No action is required on your side other than making sure that you configure the required provider. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现一个自定义。The following example shows how to implement a custom . 若要能够配置此提供程序，如在下一步配置摘录内容中所示，你必须安装它在全局程序集缓存 (GAC) 中。To be able to configure this provider, as shown in the next configuration excerpt, you must install it in the Global Assembly Cache (GAC). 请参阅[实现保护配置提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/afc329e4-ef37-4915-b419-b37c745d2865)有关详细信息。Refer to [Implementing a Protected Configuration Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/afc329e4-ef37-4915-b419-b37c745d2865) for more information. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider/CS/ProtectedConfigurationProviderLib.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider/VB/ProtectedConfigurationProviderLib.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用先前的自定义。The following example shows how to use the previous custom . [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.UsingProtectedConfigurationProvider#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.UsingProtectedConfigurationProvider/CS/ProtectedConfigurationProvider.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.UsingProtectedConfigurationProvider#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.UsingProtectedConfigurationProvider/VB/ProtectedConfigurationProvider.vb#11)] 下面是使用上述示例的配置文件的摘录。The following is an excerpt of the configuration file used by the above examples. ``` ```
